original_title: Detention orders issued against 21-year-old female arrested over ‘Club Wasantha’ murder
original_body_lines: Police have secured detention orders against the 21-year-old female arrested on suspicion of being linked to the killing of ‘Club Wasantha’ at Athurugiriya recently.
Thus, the Kaduwela Magistrate’s Court has issued a 48-hour detention order to interrogate the suspect, after she was produced before the court.
The 21-year-old was arrested by police this morning in connection with the incident.
